title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.8 - Segregation of funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.8 - Segregation of funds

State Regulations

The account wagering licensee shall, upon receipt of
money from account holders and related winning wagers, deposit such money
within 72 hours in a segregated bank account, kept and maintained by the
account wagering licensee until appropriately distributed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4500.8

Amended

New

York State Register July 26, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 30, eff. 7/26/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
